name: performance_plugin
description: Network performance monitoring and bandwidth analysis plugin for NetLogAI
author: NetLogAI Team

cpu_threshold.description: CPU utilization threshold percentage for alerts

memory_threshold.description: Memory utilization threshold percentage for alerts

interface_utilization_threshold.description: Interface utilization threshold percentage for alerts

latency_threshold.description: Latency threshold in milliseconds for alerts

analysis_window_minutes.description: Analysis window in minutes for performance metrics
